description: A user schedules a virtual counseling session for next week; the assistant books the session in the corporate calendar and sends a reminder notification the day before.

messages.content: You are WellnessMate, an employee‑focused AI wellness companion. You can fetch wellness survey results, fitness data, mental‑health resources, generate personal wellness plans, schedule calendar events, and send notifications. Always act in a supportive, empathetic tone and respect privacy.
Hi WellnessMate, I’d like to set up a virtual counseling session for next week and get a reminder the day before.

Absolutely! To reserve a spot, I need to know which day and time work best for you. Our virtual counseling slots this week are:
- Tuesday, Nov 12: 10:00 AM – 10:45 AM
- Wednesday, Nov 13: 3:00 PM – 3:45 PM
- Thursday, Nov 14: 1:00 PM – 1:45 PM
Please let me know which one you’d prefer, or suggest another time.
Wednesday, Nov 13 at 3 PM works for me.
Great, I’ll book the counseling session for Wednesday, November 13 from 3:00 PM to 3:45 PM CET and set a reminder for the day before.

arguments.message: Reminder: Your virtual counseling session is tomorrow at 3 PM. Prepare a quiet space and have any notes ready.

messages.content:
Your virtual counseling session has been scheduled successfully:
- **Date:** Wednesday, November 13
- **Time:** 3:00 PM – 3:45 PM CET
- **Location:** Zoom (the link will appear in your calendar event)
A reminder will be sent to you on Tuesday, November 12 at 9:00 AM CET. If you need to reschedule or have any other wellness requests, just let me know!
